h2_title: The Estate of the Zhu Awaken Wine Worm
content: Upon starting Chapter 4, you will find yourself in a small town called the Estate of the Zhu, where you will fight the Second Sister. Explore one of the shacks to the right of the Second Sister fight arena to find the next Awaken Wine Worm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Estate of the Zhu Awaken Wine Worm'.
The content is as follows:
Upon starting Chapter 4, you will find yourself in a small town called the Estate of the Zhu, where you will fight the Second Sister. Explore one of the shacks to the right of the Second Sister fight arena to find the next Awaken Wine Worm.
